## How to Use

**Find session by date:**
```bash
grep "2025-10-29" docs/sessions/INDEX.md
```

**Filter by status:**
```bash
# Unvalidated
grep "âš ï¸" docs/sessions/INDEX.md

# Passed validation
grep "âœ…" docs/sessions/INDEX.md

# Failed validation
grep "âŒ" docs/sessions/INDEX.md
```

**View recent sessions:**
```bash
head -20 docs/sessions/INDEX.md
```
